yes.describe: assume default/previous values for any empty paramters

sum.describe: switch to sum mode. write mode by default

edit.describe: open sheet in text editor (value of env $EDITOR)

go.describe: open the working directory on the specified project (if specified earlier with --link)

link.describe: record the current directory s the working directory for this project

today.describe: set start and end times to 0000:00 and 23:59:59

paid.describe: if writing, set this as the latest paid date for this client. set start time to the last paid date, if recorded on the current project

daily.describe: print a sum for each day separately

format.describe: format: normal, minimal, tsv, csv (default: normal)
